page.title: 09INDUSTRY:GENERAL
page.content: The largest factory in our area is {John Deere}(see page 10) Second comes{Blue Circle}(see page 11) Apart from these two there are a number of smaller factories. {Britannia Stone}employing 21 people manufacture pre-cast concrete. {Shortland Crafts}employ 20 making kitchen fitings. {Sandra Partridge Designs} employs 10 and makes fashion clothes. {Line Productions}employs 6 making commercial and industrial; {Mees}repairs and supplies televisions; These employ local labour mostly; However the largest employer locally is {Reeds Corrugated Card; }just outside our survey area;
